AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 23 /2009 
 
 
Subject:-  Passengers’ suggestion /complaints at airports. 
 
 
 
                 In order to monitor various incidents / complaints reported by 
passengers at airports, it has been decided that  Complaint / Suggestion Box 
shall be placed at Sterile  Hold Area (SHA) of the airports. A format for 
obtaining the views from air passengers has been devised. This format should 
be made available to the passengers in the SHA of the airport. A tri-lingual 
board for the purpose may be displayed at a conspicuous place. The complaint 
/ suggestion forms should be kept  in a transparent plastic box which should be 
easily accessible to the passengers. These forms written by the passengers 
should be kept in the other box which should be duly locked and kept in the 
SHA itself. The Box shall be opened by the Airport Director of the concerned 
airport and matters related to aviation security shall be reported to BCAS after 
scrutiny/ examination. 
 
2. 
      This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) and 
will be implemented by all concerned with immediate effect.  
 
 
 
 
 ( M.Malaviya, IPS )
